alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:49PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...AREAS OF DENSE FOG AFFECTING AREAS NEAR LAKE SUPERIOR... Areas of dense fog will affect areas near Lake Superior tonight. Visibilities of 1/2 to 1/4 mile have already been observed on Park Point and in Superior, which should persist through the overnight hours. Visibilities are expected to improve after sunrise Saturday morning. If traveling tonight, reduce your speed and use low-beam headlights when encountering foggy areas. It`s possible the fog may push further inland and if it becomes more widespread, Dense Fog Advisories may be needed. Keep updated on the latest forecast for fog development trends.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
